document.full_text: italy's prime minister silvio berlusconi named economy minister giulio tremonti as a potential successor to lead the center-right if he decides not to stand again in elections planned for 2013.
document.title: italy's berlusconi names possible successor
lines_and_colors: italy's prime minister silvio berlusconi named economy minister giulio tremonti as a potential successor to lead the center-right if he decides not to stand again in elections planned for 2013.
